General.Name: Observe Medical Asa
General.Description: Observe Medical ASA engages in developing and commercializing medical technology products for patients, healthcare professionals, and hospitals in Norway, Sweden, the United States, and rest of European countries. It offers Sippi, a digital and automated urine measurement system for urine monitoring and biofilm control; and Biim, a wireless pocketable ultrasound device for display of the ultrasound image and video for nurses and medical staff. The company also offers Unometer, Safeti Plus, Unometer 500, UnoMeter, and AbdoPressure products used for drainage, collection, and measurement of urine output from patients, as well as provides medtech devices and disposables within urine measurement, anesthesiology/ICUs, and wound care products. Observe Medical ASA was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.
